channel.title: CVE Feed for Pegasystems -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Pegasystems -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-28093|2023-04-10T00:00:00 -- pegasystems -- rpa%3A%20synchronization%20engine
item.description: A user with a compromised configuration can start an unsigned binary as a service.

item.title: CVE-2023-28094|2023-08-05T07:26:35.937Z -- pegasystems -- pega%20platform
item.description: Pega platform clients who are using versions 7.4 through 8.8.x and have upgraded from a version prior to 8.x may be utilizing default credentials.

item.title: CVE-2023-4843|2023-09-08T16:06:44.528Z -- pegasystems -- pega%20platform
item.description: Pega Platform versions 7.1 to 8.8.3 are affected by an HTML Injection issue with a name field utilized in Visual Business Director, however this field can only be modified by an authenticated administrative user.

item.title: CVE-2023-32087|2023-10-18T11:39:51.648Z -- pegasystems -- pega%20platform
item.description: Pega Platform versions 8.1 to Infinity 23.1.0 are affected by an XSS issue with task creation

item.title: CVE-2023-32090|2023-08-07T11:53:48.738Z -- pegasystems -- pega%20platform
item.description: Pega platform clients who are using versions 6.1 through 7.3.1 may be utilizing default credentials

item.title: CVE-2023-32089|2023-10-18T11:45:16.300Z -- pegasystems -- pega%20platform
item.description: Pega Platform versions 8.1 to 8.8.2 are affected by an XSS issue with Pin description

item.title: CVE-2023-32088|2023-10-18T11:42:31.137Z -- pegasystems -- pega%20platform
item.description: Pega Platform versions 8.1 to Infinity 23.1.0 are affected by an XSS issue with ad-hoc case creation

item.title: CVE-2023-26467|2023-04-10T00:00:00 -- pegasystems -- rpa%3A%20synchronization%20engine
item.description: A man in the middle can redirect traffic to a malicious server in a compromised configuration.

item.title: CVE-2023-26466|2023-04-10T00:00:00 -- pegasystems -- rpa%3A%20synchronization%20engine
item.description: A user with non-Admin access can change a configuration file on the client to modify the Server URL.

item.title: CVE-2023-26465|2023-06-09T00:00:00 -- pegasystems -- pega%20infinity
item.description: Pega Platform versions 7.2 to 8.8.1 are affected by an XSS issue.

item.title: CVE-2023-50166|2024-01-31T17:26:42.731Z -- pegasystems -- pega%20platform
item.description: Pega Platform from 8.5.4 to 8.8.3 is affected by an XSS issue with an unauthenticated user and the redirect parameter.

item.title: CVE-2023-50167|2024-06-04T17:17:52.331Z -- pegasystems -- pega%20platform
item.description: Pega Platform from 7.1.7 to 23.1.1 is affected by an XSS issue with editing/rendering user html content.

item.title: CVE-2023-50168|2024-06-04T17:17:50.046Z -- pegasystems -- pega%20platform
item.description: Pega Platform from 6.x to 8.8.4 is affected by an XXE issue with PDF Generation.

item.title: CVE-2023-50165|2024-01-31T17:21:04.235Z -- pegasystems -- pega%20platform
item.description: Pega Platform versions 8.2.1 to Infinity 23.1.0 are affected by an Generated PDF issue that could expose file contents.
